website_summaries.verdict: Dissipates impact energy efficiently. Provides maximum comfort when wearing it for a full day.
pros: Includes full brim to gain protection from the sun
Sturdy hat that's well designed to stand up to any impacts
Multiple options for adjusting the hard hat to fit properly
Includes sweat band for wearing in hot working conditions without problems with sweat
cons: Sits high on the head, which may cause it to feel unbalanced

customer_reviews.title: fist week trying this helmet was comfortable sits low on your head not like others that ...
customer_reviews.text: Fast standard shipping! My product came in a box with no damages or miss parts . I wear hard hats 6 days a week 10hrs a day .fist week trying this helmet was comfortable sits low on your head not like others that are a little bit high. It snaps and stays tight on your head also it's very light hardhat . Hardhat already came with the suspension installed so no need for you to take 30 minutes installing one
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin  Dominguez

customer_reviews.title: and this is definitely the most comfortable hard hat I have worn
customer_reviews.text: Archaeologist here, and this is definitely the most comfortable hard hat I have worn. I can bend all the way over and it stays on my head. The adjustment knob works really well, and the hat sits quite low so I'm not always knocking into things with it. I never thought I would write a review of a hard hat, but sometimes life takes you funny places. This is a good hard hat.
customer_reviews.author: PavelPeopleEater

customer_reviews.title: Cause of the low profile It doesn't make me look like a conehead
customer_reviews.text: This hat actually fits my big ass head. It sits low on my head, near my brow bone. Cause of the low profile It doesn't make me look like a conehead. Spend the extra bucks and buy fibre metal. This hat is legit.
customer_reviews.author: Hector.

customer_reviews.title: Just what I ordered.
customer_reviews.text: What I ordered and expected. Very light and comfortable. I ordered on 11/6/17 and received it on 11/8/17. The manufacture date is 10/2017, see photos.
customer_reviews.author: J-K

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Got home today after work and saw my package sitting on my door step and I walked back to my truck grabbed my old hard hat and tossed that uncomfortable pile right in the trash. Best hardhat and super comfortable and it even arrived quicker then It was suppose to.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great hat but doesn't do well under the hot sun.
customer_reviews.text: Husband loves the hat! Unfortunately, we live in Texas and it's hot. The hat heats up pretty quickly and can't be used. BUT! He liked it so much he just ordered a white one. Hopefully this one can withstand the Texas heat!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia V

customer_reviews.title: Quality Helmet
customer_reviews.text: A great lid for the noggin Fellows , and very comfortable as well
customer_reviews.author: Plazmapete

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfect.. tightens really good perfect with a rim shade great color.. I work in asphalt its lightweight bought it since the ones at work they give are bigger fit high and you cannot put a rim around it properly
customer_reviews.author: Albert Alcaraz

customer_reviews.title: Sits low and comfort !!
customer_reviews.text: Best hardhat for the price. All of us have switched to this one. Sits lower on the head and is super comfortable. Now whenever I go back to the old style I run the top of the hat into piping. Try it you'll like it.
customer_reviews.author: Svenska

customer_reviews.title: Nice Hard Hat
customer_reviews.text: I am over 50 years old and have wore hard hats my entire working career. I have worn them all. I think this one may be one of my favorites. It is light and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Lenny Weryat

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and strong, I like the way it fits
customer_reviews.author: Jesse sellers

customer_reviews.title: Fit is not and uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Fit and comfort is not there. I have had other hard hats and this is the most uncomfortable.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Happy customer with this new helmet to use in hazardous environment.
customer_reviews.author: BPDad

customer_reviews.title: as lite as a ball cap
customer_reviews.text: I started a new job and they did not have any extra hard hats so I bought my own, I love the full brim and it is so lite you almost forget it is on your head.
customer_reviews.author: Jbeck

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: So I didn’t like how it was to change the depth or whatever my head fits in because I belt like I was breaking it but once in place I really like it I have a big head and it fits nice for the price you can’t beat it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a lineman in a windy area and was looking for something that sits lower and catches less wind than my ERB Omega II. This is lighter, sits lower, and catches less wind so I like it. I wish the brim was a slight bit wider but all in all I like it and it's the most comfortable hat I've owned. Shipping was fast and painless. The suspension came with it.
customer_reviews.author: JPM

customer_reviews.title: Nice hard hat.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a costume. Look sturdy for workers needed. Not an expert .

customer_reviews.title: this is the one that rides low is very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I owned a dozen different brands, this is the one that rides low is very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Fits great, love the easy adjust headband
customer_reviews.text: Fits great, love the easy adjust headband. The only thing I would have liked is a more absorbent sweat band. I wear a bandanna under the hat and that solves the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Gray Bear

customer_reviews.title: 4 out of 5 only because it took a couple weeks to break in.
customer_reviews.text: Wear it everyday. Was a little uncomfortable at first but I believe it "molded" itself to my head. Great hat so far.

customer_reviews.text: Great hat, can get small enough for my son (3) to wear when I'm off work. Keeps the rain from rolling right down your back.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! As advertised. Thank you!!!
customer_reviews.text: Feels flimsy but I like it. You can bend it with your hands. Kind of the bump cap feel. I wear my other heard had in rough work areas.
customer_reviews.author: keepontrying

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Light weight and durable. Holds up in any weather and removable sweat bands is awesome
customer_reviews.author: Ernesto

customer_reviews.title: Great hard hat!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this hard hat! Says it's the most comfortable one he's ever worn.
customer_reviews.author: Renee R

customer_reviews.title: cream of the crop
customer_reviews.text: I've bought and used various hard hats from various manufacturers and always come back to Fibre-Metal because they just fit the best. Others sit too high on the head and are not as stable as this one is. I wear a hard hat a minimum of 8 hours a day and 5 days a week in construction and this is the most comfortable, lightest one I've found yet. I've got a white one and a grey one and have given away all others. ...even the vented ones. This is the one you want, don't waste your time or money on the others!
customer_reviews.author: DOGBOX

customer_reviews.title: ... on the head band would have been a little better other than that it's
customer_reviews.text: I would have thought the pad on the head band would have been a little better other than that it's good
customer_reviews.author: abrooks4u

customer_reviews.title: To date, best hard hat I've ever worn.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Sits low on my head and is the most comfortable hard hat I've ever had on my head... and I've worn many different styles and manufacturers of hard hats over the years. The manufacture stamp shows 2014 (for all of you HSE folks) so I'll get to use it for a few years. The gray looks pretty sharp as well. When the time comes for my next hard hat, it will be a Fibre-Metal.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Boreman

customer_reviews.title: good hard hat
customer_reviews.text: nice hard hat. not to heavy, strap holding up good
customer_reviews.author: VillarrealS

customer_reviews.title: Best of the best
customer_reviews.text: By far the best fitting hard hat available without spending 50 bucks. Sits down low on ur head snug secure fit that allows you to wrk upside down without fear of losing it. Only brand to go with especially for the larger melons...
customer_reviews.author: Anthony James

customer_reviews.title: Good lid for the price
customer_reviews.text: Was shipped very quickly. Very comfortable fit an really like how low it sits on my head. An it's light compared to other lids I've worn, all an all I like it!
customer_reviews.author: shawn b.

customer_reviews.title: Looks like a costume hard hat it's so large
customer_reviews.text: Returned. Looks like a costume hard hat it's so large. I'm sure the quality is there it's just way too big.
customer_reviews.author: Mike McCoy

customer_reviews.title: comfortable, easy to adjust
customer_reviews.text: Compared to more expensive hardhats, this supereight full brim hardhat definitely gets the job done. It's cheap, comfortable, easy to adjust, and stays on your head. This hardhat has protected my noggin from serious injuries a multitude of times; though I do suspect I would also be less likely to bump into certain things if the profile of my head was not enlarged by the hat itself. It does get kind of hot though, perhaps a vented hardhat may be worth looking into.
customer_reviews.author: TEK57

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in a timely manner and seems to be a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: oneal

customer_reviews.title: The full brim saved me from some pretty nasty accidents
customer_reviews.text: The full brim saved me from some pretty nasty accidents, the whole hard hat all together is great and has protected me from some heavy contact in demolition, great helmet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great hardhat
customer_reviews.text: Sits lower on my head and tilts forward more. I live it. I am a dirt superintendent and I couldn't be more impressed.

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommneded!
customer_reviews.text: Great Helmet! Superior quality and fitment on my egg shaped head. Sits lower than your traditonal full or hat style helmets from Home Depot or Lowes. Use my helmet for Towing and Recovery.

customer_reviews.title: Made for me!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed and wanted. Great fit and comfort.

customer_reviews.title: Safety and Comfort
customer_reviews.text: Been in construction for over 20yrs and these Fibre-metal hardhats are the only ones I wear. Lightweight and easy to adjust for a comfortable fit. Wearing one all day doesn't feel like a chore, but the foam band does little for sweat on a hot summer day.

customer_reviews.text: This hard hat is like a 5 gallon bucket. Way too tall. Seems well made just very tall for a hard hat

product_meta.title: SUPEREIGHT Class E, G or C Type I Thermoplastic Hard Hat With Full Brim And 3-R Ratchet Suspension
product_meta.description: FIBE1RW09A000 Features: -Fibre-Metal's sophisticated SUPEREIGHT Impact Energy Control System raises protective performance to a new level. On impact, the smooth shell flexes, absorbing and dissipating some impact energy. The reduced impact energy is passed to the suspension system at eight scientifically determined points around the cap, thus dispersing the energy over a greater area of the head, reducing the risk of failure at any one point. During everyday wear, SUPERIGHT's low center of gravity, multiple adjustments, and choice of full sweatband, ratchet headband, or patented SWINGSTRAP provides the right fit and feel for maximum comfort. Most Fibre-Metal protective hats and cap are SEI certified. All come fully assembled. SUPEREIGHT protection plus an extra margin of protection from the sun's harmful rays. Full brim shades more of the face, neck and ears.. -ELECTRIC W/3-R RATCHET HEADBAND. -UNSPC CODE: 46181700. -Hardhats & Caps. Product Type: -Hard Hats.
